special_text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. If its power is 4 or greater, it gains flying until end of turn.
[-2]: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. When the creature you control wins the fight, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[-6]: For any number of permanents, double the number of any number of kinds of counters on that permanent.
notes:
Planename: Alkabah
